alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Greene; Knox (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 12:03PM EST until February 28 at 7:51PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Spencer and Edwardsport. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Newberry...Elliston...and Petersburg. .Multiple rounds of recent precipitation, preceded by snow melt, will keep minor flooding ongoing along the East Fork White, upper White and most of the Upper Wabash. Lower portions of the White and Wabash are expected to see moderate flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Newberry. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flood waters block access and begins to surround about 5 to 10 river cabins on south side of the river just southwest of Newberry. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Friday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:30 AM EST Friday was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.7 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 1215 AM EST /1115 PM CST/.
